oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COMPARISON OF NYLON-6 PREPARED BY BULK AND CAST ACTIVATED ANIONIC-POLYMERIZATION METHODS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESAI, MR
PANDYA, MV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: initiator
activated anionic polymerization
cast polymerization
crystallinity
diisocyanates
nylon-6
polyamides
physical and electrical properties
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nylon 6 was synthesized from epsilon-caprolactam (CL) and two different diisocyanate based initiator systems. Two polymerization methods were followed, viz., bulk and cast methods. The effect of initiator structure and polymerization method on physical, mechanical and electrical properties of nylon 6 prepared thereof is discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MACROMOLECULAR SCIENCE-PURE AND APPLIED CHEMISTRY, A31(), 597-611
